title: Web Development
description: Build modern websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics

title: Python Programming
description: Intro to coding and logic; accessible to students with no prior experience.

title: Data Science
description: Requires some Python knowledge; moves into data handling, ML basics.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Learners should already understand programming before diving into app frameworks.

title: Cybersecurity
description: Needs strong networking and system fundamentals to explore vulnerabilities and protection.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Assumes familiarity with development & deployment before managing cloud infrastructures.
